subject: Football
Soccer
African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
Super Bowl
Skeleton (Sport)
lead_paragraph: A view of the day in sports, including media day ahead of the Super Bowl in New Orleans and elimination day for a couple of teams in the African Cup of Nations soccer tournament in South Africa.
